comments.body:
Since u r asking this in sure money isn't a problem. 
But manipal easily . Better college life and better placements
I guess Crowd Is Better in PES  than Manipal
Choose college life over placements any day op. Manipal easily
Please for the love of your life choose Manipal

Pes. If ur from Bangalore choose PES. The city offers much more than what manipal ever can offer. Much more opportunities, better nightlife, better network. 

If u just want an amazing college experience full of hostel dorm stuff , beaches , freedom from parents and just a chill life with the typical college life in ur mind, manipal is the way for u.
Hey Pes pr, are they paying you well?
